text: Marmaduke is a 2010 live action movie. It is adapted from Brad Anderson's comic strip of the same name. The movie is about a rural Kansas family and their pets, a Great Dane named Marmaduke and a Balinese cat named Carlos. The family moves to California because of business . The movie was released on June 4, 2010. It had negative reviews. ==References== Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American movies Category:Movies about dogs Category:Movies about cats Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in Kansas
title: Marmaduke (movie)
